title: The Thank You Light
description: It's time to clear the docket! Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn discuss Sequim, WA, Grape Nuts and eggs, car communication features, dollops of mayo, Lord of the Rings trivia, and much more!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Judge John Hodgman, MaximumFun.org)
